page.title: 02FARMING-Ownership M.R/Elsham
page.content:
There is no complete farm within this area.The seven 'part'farms in the survey are typical in being almost entirely arable.There are very small areas of three other farms. FARM OWNER TENANT 1 Top Farm E. of Y. Y.Farm Croxton Estates. 2 Melton Hall Y.1961 " " Farm. Settlement 3 Melton High E. of Y. Private Wood. Farmer 4 The Oaks " " " " 5 Elsham Top joint farmer+ Farm. County Estates " " 6 Dodd's Top County Estates " " Farm. 7 Jackson's. Farmer n/a. Top Farm
KEY : E. of Y. = Earl of Yarborough. Y. = Yarborough.
